_meanings:
{@--2@} Dissimulation
or concealment of an internal feeling,
regarded as one of the 33 subordinate
feelings ({#vyaBicAriBAva#}); 
{#BayagOravalajjAderharzAdyAkAraguptiravahitTA#} <ls>S. D.</ls>; or according
to <ls>R. G.</ls> {#vrIqAdinA nimittena harzAdyanuBAvAnAM#}
{#gopanAya janito BAvaviSezo'vahitTaM#}; for ex.
see <ls>Ku. 6. 84</ls>, or <ls>Bv. 2. 80.</ls>
